channel.title: The Combat Triangle
channel.description:
I was thinking about melee, and how overpowered it is than mage/range.
Jagex mentioned they will be releasing the dragon crossbow (Rune.Wikia), but not until the combat triangle is rebalanced (meaning Range is overpowered?)
So what are you opinions on the combat triangle, and how it could be fixed?

item.title: The Combat Triangle
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:22, topic:400890”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=497946.msg3643507#msg3643507 date=1309195585]

at lower combat levels, magic is overpowered and at higher combat levels, range seems to be overpowered.
[/quote]How so? Any normal magic spells aren’t really that strong, and don’t have any ‘special’ effects

i was talking about lowww combat levels. level 8 doing 80’s from fire strike etc[/quote]
Yea a low lvl mage pure can easily hit a 13 against someone else who might only have 15 hp.

Read full topic

item.title: The Combat Triangle
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Pet peeve in this topic. Stop saying you hit can hit 500. No, you hit 50.
Also, I would call magic the best. A manual switch between ice spells and blood spells can keep them still and you healed.

Read full topic

item.title: The Combat Triangle
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:15, topic:400890”]You are missing stuff:
Magic -
Freezing capability
Healing without missing attack

Range-
Special bolt effects (like dragon fire that can hit an extra 450 damage)[/quote]

Magic:
Barrage (Desert Treasure)

Range:
Crossbow/Dbolts (hits 450-600 specials)

You got me on the healing part

Read full topic

item.title: The Combat Triangle
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You are missing stuff:
Magic -
Freezing capability
Healing without missing attack

Range-
Special bolt effects (like dragon fire that can hit an extra 450 damage)

Personally I don’t think range is that over powered, I mean sure they can hit high but it’s not like they prevent the other person from hitting them, and they don’t hit higher than typical melee/magic attacks. I just think the freezing capability of mages is the overpowered part.

Read full topic

item.title: The Combat Triangle
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

So now lets look at the logical sides to all ways to basically “max” the most out of your gear in PvP terms.

Tell me if I’m missing anything. And from this it looks like melee would win.

Magic:
Chaotic staff (Need 80+ dungeon)
Arcane necklace(Need like 62 dungeon)
Mage gear (Ahrims/mystic)
Barrage (Desert Treasure)

Range:
Hand Cannon (Forgiveness of a Chaos Dwarf)
Crossbow/Dbolts (hits 450-600 specials)
Dragon bow (maxes now are like 700+)

Melee:
All chaotics (Need 80 dungeon)
Godswords (Ags maxes 800+)
Dragon claws (Can hit combined 1000+)
Dds (Lost City)
Korasi (The Void Stares Back)
Bandos armor

All of the above:
Void Armor
Void Elite Armor

Read full topic

item.title: The Combat Triangle
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:11, topic:400890”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=497946.msg3641485#msg3641485 date=1309037519]
Even though Dharok can 1-hit a LOT of people, AGS can hit over 800 in the right gear, Korasi 700, and DDS over 900 in 1 special (albeit insanely rare ._. )
[/quote]

Dharok is incredibly risky, and the odds of a 1 hit right of the bat are incredibly stupid, as you would need to start with 5 hp. Normally, when you see people making on youtube, they only hit 80+ because the other person has no armor as the attacker is max potted. Dds has a shitload of potential, but again extremely rare.[/quote]
I’m guessing you never pked with Dh on runescape, amazing profits if you risk like 5-6 sets of dh. I made 500% of what I paid in like 30 mins with it.

Read full topic

item.title: The Combat Triangle
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

melee used to be really overpowered compared to everything else, but updates were made to, well range specifically, that changed things. The dark bow came out, and void came out (which became popular for range). With the release of hunter, chins became very fast xp. Range might be more powerful than everything else. That being said I own an old school server so idk. depends on the situation really (multi/single. f2p/p2p. pure/main…)

Read full topic

So technically you could hit 4040 if you use the entire special bar

item.title: The Combat Triangle
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

I think melee is underpowered. Compared to the hits with ranged and magic, melee’ing could be somewhat effective to a degree only used with the right gear.

Read full topic

item.title: The Combat Triangle
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Davidi2:

I personally think mage is OP, or specifically ancient magic (normal magic is a bit under powered). If you do it right (which isn’t hard to do) you can make it so you take no damage at all (by freezing, running away when they get unfrozen, then freezing again) or heal to full hp again without wasting game ticks to eat (blood spells) while doing damage at the same time. While yea, it should have advantages against melee, it shouldn’t be invincible if you have only a small amount of skill.

Plus you can hit like 450s with Chaotic Staff + Arcane Necklace

Read full topic

item.title: The Combat Triangle
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I personally think mage is OP, or specifically ancient magic (normal magic is a bit under powered). If you do it right (which isn’t hard to do) you can make it so you take no damage at all (by freezing, running away when they get unfrozen, then freezing again) or heal to full hp again without wasting game ticks to eat (blood spells) while doing damage at the same time. While yea, it should have advantages against melee, it shouldn’t be invincible if you have only a small amount of skill.

item.title: The Combat Triangle
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:3, topic:400890”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=497946.msg3641416#msg3641416 date=1309034023]
Hasn’t range always been overpowered if you used the right gear?
[/quote]
You can hit 60s or more with the right bolts.[/quote]
You can hit 400-700s with AGS/Korasi (Korasi is melee, though it hits magic)

You see more melee in the wildy from magers/rangers

Read full topic
